name: Plain Tic Tac Toe
description:
Can you beat that iPhone ? Is it smarter than you ?

Plain Tic Tac Toe is board game that has no eye sore graphics, no confused colours that will distract your concentration from trying to win or unnecessary glowing things. Plain and simple like you would expect if it was with a pencil and paper.

Though not so simple if your try to play the game with larger board sizes or making it hard to beat your iPhone or iPad. Choosing a larger board with there requirement of a low tics or tacs in a row might make it easier (or harder) for you to win, but don't forget you iPhone or iPad also get that advantage.

So are your clever ?
